author: aneek
title: Tawang - In March 2016
text: # 1 Hello indiamikers, My and my office colleagues were planning for Arunachal Pradesh Tawang visit for over a few years now. But every time this is canceled due to family matters or emergencies. However, this time we are so desperate and determined to visit that place. So we are planning to visit Tawang in March 2016. Below is a draft itinerary: 1. Day 1 (March 4, 2016 - Friday): Catch Saraighat Express @ 15:50. 2. Day 2 (Match 5, 2016 - Saturday): Reach Guwahati @ 09:30. Take bus service to reach Tezpur. Night halt at Tezpur. Local sightseeing. Stay in hotel "Grand City". 3. Day 3 (March 6, 2016 - Sunday): Early start from Tezpur to reach Dirang. I hope it's nearly 7 hours drive. One stop at Bhalukpong to have some refreshments. On the way, visit Tipi. Night halt at Dirang. Hotel Pemaling 4. Day 4 (Match 7, 2016 - Monday): Early start from Dirang towards Tawang. On the way visit Sela Pass, War Cemetery and lakes. I hope this journey will take 6-7 hours. Stay at Hotel Sela. 5. Day 5 (March 8, 2016 - Tuesday): Whole day at Tawang and local sightseeing. Resolve any Permit issues if not made before to visit Bum-la pass and other areas. 6. Day 6 (March 9, 2016 - Wednesday): Early morning start from Tawang to visit Tawang Monstery, PT Tso, Bum-la pass etc. 7. Day 7 (March 10, 2016 - Thursday): Early start to reach Bomdila. Reach Bomdila and if possible visit Gontse Rabgyaling Monastery, Bomdila View Point etc. Night stay at Bomdila. 8. Day 8 (March 11, 2016 - Friday): Reach Guwahati and night halt at Guwahati. 9. Day 9 (March 12, 2016 - Saturday): Catch Saraighat Express @ 12:35. 10. Day 10 (March 13, 2016 - Sunday): Reach Howrah and End of trip. I had posted here a long time back ( Tawang in December's last week (25th - 30th) ) so I have some very basic idea on ILP. However, below are some of my questions: 1. ON DAY #2: Where we can get the bus? 2. ON DAY #3: Any other places that we can visit while in the road towards Dirang? And Any other suggestions on the hotel apart from what is mentioned? 3. ON DAY #4: Any suggestions on hotels in Tawang apart from Hotel Sela? 4. Any suggestions on good car rentals (I believe local driver will be good isn't it?)
